name: Lyre, Lyre: The Extremely Real Adventures of Enephtes
name_original: Lyre, Lyre: The Extremely Real Adventures of Enephtes
description:
You are a bard who dreams of becoming the next Homer... and you might just have a shot, if you can convince the people of Greece that your useless brother Enephtes is a hero worthy of epic poetry. 

Lie and bluff your way through a magnetic poetry mad-lib campaign and upgrade your words to spread your entirely undeserving brother's fame throughout the land!
